content.question: Primus ibi ante omnes magna comitante caterva Laocoon ardens summa decurrit ab arce, et procul "O miseri, quae tanta insania, cives? Creditis avectos hostes? Aut ulla putatis (5) dona carere dolis Danaum? Sic notus Ulixes? Aut hoc inclusi ligno occultantur Achivi, aut haec in nostros fabricata est machina muros." Aeneid 2.40-46 Answer the following questions in English unless the question specifically asks you to write out Latin words. Number your answer to each question. 1. Translate magna comitante caterva (line 1) in context AND name the grammatical construction.
